name: Ghost Destruction Repairman
description:
GHOST DESTRUCTION REPAIRMAN

play as Gary and Jake, two supernatural repairmen specializing in fixing the havoc caused by ghosts in homes and banishing them back to the spirit world.  smack those ghosts with your trusty spectral wrench, and tighten the loose bolts before the house comes down!

CONTROLS
player 1 
arrows - move
Z or > - wrench
X or ? - jump

player 2
WASD - move
~  - wrench
! - jump


MADE FOR SHENANIJAM 2019

THEMES USED
Wrenches 101 
Cursemas Eve 

ACHIEVEMENTS
mozart
maverick

TOOLS
engine - Game Maker Studio 1.4
art - GMS1.4, Photoshop 7
sound - BFXR
music - BeepBox.co



MADE IN STL
